entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS, MAINLY THIS EVENING
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE DAMAGING WINDS AND HEAVY RAINFALL THIS EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS AROUND 70
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 90
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 70
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
